synopsis.text: Class is in session for Rimuru and his friends in the magical world of Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken! When Rimuru realizes that there's a lack of recreational activities in Tempest, he proposes a sumo wrestling tournament to liven things up. The competition heats up as Benimaru and the men, Shuna and Shion, and even Rimuru himself join in on the fun. But that's not all - when Shuna and Shion can't stop fighting over Rimuru's squishy slime body, he comes up with a solution: a cushion in the shape of his slime form! Rimuru sets out on a quest to gather the perfect materials, but he'll have to face off against a monster at the lake and deal with Milim's unexpected arrival. And in the outdoor training event at the Freedom Academy, Rimuru and his class must guard the teachers on a journey to a nearby town, but things take a turn when they're attacked by thieves! Will Rimuru and his friends come out on top in these exciting adventures? Find out in Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
